trends: there have been no other sightings in pa\nj turnpike
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 4 to 5 orange glowing objects in sky above PA/NJ Turnpike. 4 people seen.
divs: sighting detailsdriving back from horsham.along the turnpike about 1\2 mile away from the toll both.saw two glowing objects in sky front of my friends jeep.about 1\2 away and about 1 mile in the sky.as we arrived closer to the toll both i saw them more clear.they didn't blink or move just stayed still. asked my friend driving what is that in the sky.he replied he wasn't sure as well.by this time we were under the two objects.now about 100 yards away from the toll both.we tried to look as long as we could not sure what we were seeing but know it wasn't anything we have even seen before.when we started to look back,behind us my friend saw three more ojects that apeared in the sky.the same look to them as the first two.orange glow no movement.these objects were like in a triangle form when the other two just were like on a 45 degree slant.were did these other three come from it was like someone turned on a light in the sky.these objects were lower than the cloud cover.as we arrived at the tool both we told the man to look in the sky and he saw what we did. 4 to 5 objects in the sky.now they were about 1\2 mile away disrance from us.from were we first spotted them.we were glad to see that the man in the toll both saw this as well.he also told the other worker in the both next to him to look out and see. this man saw as well.after paying the toll we drove around try to see if we could see them but was to far from the turnpike.iam glad me and my friend saw this together.i only wish i grabed my camera out of my tackel box that was in the back of his jeep.it all happened so fast.maybe and i hope that we were not he only ones to see this besides the men working at the turnpike toll both.all and all really cool night.
